import "./Cart.css" export default function Items(props, booktitle) { return (
Title: {booktitle}
Author: {props.book.author}
Publication date: {props.book.releaseDate}
Summary:
{props.book.shortBio}
Price: Â£{props.book.price} GBP
{props.book.discount && (
Discount: {props.book.discount}%
)}
) }
